description.value: Your mask remembers the stories of Shifting Frog, Storyteller of the Past and Future. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Foresight] once per day as an innate spell, either arcane if you have Wizard Dedication or primal if you have Druid Dedication, but the duration is 10 minutes instead of 1 hour. Immediately after you Cast a non-cantrip Spell that targets only a single foe, you can Recall Knowledge about that foe.
